title: Levels In Relationships: Clarity, Release and Connection
description: LEVELS IN RELATIONSHIPS: Is dedicated to the broken hearted, to those that have searched to find a partner, a soul mate and are currently in a relationship which they fear is coming to an end. This is dedicated to the ones who are ready to explore and meet that significant other and have been told that you will have challenges in finding them. To those who have been told that a great relationship is not possible and it is a lucky thing to have. This is dedicated to each person that desires to have a manual that is clear and gives insight on how to finally have a clear understanding on what it takes to find love and how to remain in a relationship. It does not matter whether you are single, in a relationship or ending one, whether you are married or in a partnership. It does not matter which gender you or your partner are, or which religion or spiritual path you do or don't follow. This information will cover all areas including the virtual world of dating. This manual will assist you in finding and being in a powerful, great relationship experience.
author: Marilyn Holzmann
